1.content:
“I swear, it won’t happen again.”

“Somehow, I seriously doubt that. I’ll expect your uniform by the end of the day. Don’t bother coming back tomorrow morning.”

As Natalie finished taking one last bite of her cinnamon bun, she felt the blush fill up her scarlet, round cheeks. She really had blown it again. It wasn’t like she had anyone to blame other than herself--her and her stupid belly.

Still, could anyone really blame her for taking a couple of the sweets off the display counter? She was working at a freaking pastery shop! The store was practically shoving free food in her face. Yes, she may have taken a little bit more than necessary, but, really, at the end of the day could anyone blame her for snagging a few donuts at the end of the day for herself?

At least she lasted the month.

She felt a little humiliated more than anything--no, more than a little humiliated. She had been reprimanded in front of the entire store at the busiest hour of the day, and--even worse--she would’ve gotten away with sneaking had her uniform’s button not sprung off. This would’ve just been embarrassing, had said button not rocketed across the room, homing into the back of her boss’s head, whacking him upside his bald head. No, that statement wasn’t accurate enough. It had actually hit the brim of his fedora, knocking the hat off of his bald head, before the button bounced into the air, spinning like a flipped quarter, before landing heads right on the crown of the guy’s skull.

Natalie had wanted to just crawl into a ball under the desk at then, but the first stupid customer to come to her kept calling for her, attracting the boss to her plight. And then--well, the rest was history.

Natalie waited through the rest of her shift, well aware that, even now, she was leaving the only job that would hire her. She went to the locker room in the back, withdrawing her stuff, as she hastily tore off her uniform. She struggled a little bit as she pulled it off over her breasts, which caught hold of the elastic bands. Why would an elastic uniform need buttons anyway?

She caught a glimpse of her naked body in the mirror.

It seemed like she had accumulated a little fringe benefit from the job.

She pouted once more as she ran a hand over her slightly pudgy belly--no, it was a little more than that now--as she pulled her jeans over her thighs, which had grown a little more bountiful with every truffle and little pastery consumed. As she hopped up and down, struggling to fit into her size eights, she compared herself to an ice cream cone overflowing with vanilla ice cream.

No, more like strawberry.

She was blushing.

Her belly hung slightly over the lips of her pants, a sensation she was unfamiliar with. The pinching and uncomfortable awkwardness was uncanny, abnormal. In high school, she had long, sleek legs, the type you’d associate with a dancer or something. In actuality, she had done soccer with some running on the side, but the technicalities weren’t important.

Point is, when she pressed a finger to the flesh, she felt her muscle buried beneath her meat. Maybe if she had some sort of excavation to the center of Natalie, she’d find some muscle.

Until then…

After tying her hair back into a ponytail--and exposing her fuller cheeks and slightly thicker neck--she found herself wandering down the street, walking to the bus stop. Even her cardigan was tight on her soft shoulders. As she tried readjusting herself, she began to appreciate her position right now. She was stuck in the worst of situations, since she was stuck without a job with college bills to pay, now officially boyfriend-less, and, on top of all else, she had been paid in pounds rather than dollars.

Well, at least the chub lent itself well to interesting puns.

No, she had to work out! She had to find some other job to take. Laying a finger aside her chin, she went down the list of possible professions open to her. Cashier at a store? No, those customers were complete jack-asses. It was always easier to feed someone at a bakery. They always were in high spirits there, always willing to smile and thank a customer. Not at those stores where people had a bug up their butt.

What about as a bank teller? Yeah, just the right job for her. Less contact with people, unless said people were armed robbers, holding her at gun point. She imagined herself curled up into a ball under the desk--no, it was even worse now, since with her extra pounds she was just a juicier target! She couldn’t fight back, since even walking down this one block was enough to put her out of breath.

“Help wanted.”

The sign caught her eye almost instantly. She turned around, heart racing, as she stared at the sign. She was staring at another bakery, this one a cute one that had been designed intentionally to resemble a gingerbread house, like in that old fairy tale. Natalie wondered if it was such a wise idea to design a bakery after a cannibal witch’s house, but she didn’t make the damn place.

Still, maybe she could work there.

Jessica’s eyes lit up. She hastily drew backward, accidentally clanging her head against a dangling display, before withdrawing a paper underneath the desk. As she rubbed her cranium, tears in her eyes, she said, in a strained voice, “Here ya go. Sorry, just--yeah, clumsy.”

“It’s fine,” Natalie asked, glancing at the form. She quickly looked it over. However, before she finished it, Jessica took the form away, glancing at her with a look of confusion. “What’s wrong?”

“Look, do you want the job?”

“Well, kinda. I just got fired from my last job, and--” Wait, she shouldn’t have said that.Blush filling up her round face, Natalie stammered back, “Look, it wasn’t a big deal why I was fired. I just--it was a total accident, understand? Unintentional! I didn’t mean to--”

“Did you steal money?”

“Uh, as opposed to kill someone else--?”

“Or was it just a clothing malfunction?”

Natalie sighed. “That’s part of the reason…”

“That’s not a big deal then. I mean, so long as it wasn’t illegal--”

“Well, I kinda took free food,” Natalie confessed.

It was even sweeter than the last one.

"I was the one who got you hired and fired at the first bakery!" Janelle said with a smirk, "And who made sure that you saw the help wanted sign in the window." Whenever someone stopped to catch their breath or recover from brain freeze, she scolded them, adding another tub to their sentence. Eventually, she allowed all of the girls to stop, each laying down and rubbing their stuffed, sore belly. All except Natalie, who had to go on for hours before she was allowed to stop. By the time it was over for her, she looked like a pig, ice cream all over her hands and face. There was even some that fell into her bra.

Others think that she found a feeder and never left her apartment again. Both were equally plausible, but neither was true. What happened to Janelle would remain a secret forever.

111111111221.content:
Natalie’s shift was coming to a close, and normally this would make her feel defeated, because it meant the train of free sweets was coming to an end for the day. But today she was actually excited to get off from work. Not only had she made plans with her plumping companion, she told Jessica the whole story and she was nothing but sympathetic.

“What a jerk.” Jessica fumed. Jessica had a soft spot when it came to girls who didn’t conform to the small waists club, and from that Natalie was telling her, Ashley seemed like just the kinda person Jessica would get along with. “You are a good friend Natalie. Tell you what, I’m going to sponsor your little get together tonight, take as much leftovers from the bakery tonight as you want on me.”

“Really?” Natalie was filled with glee, at first by the generous offer, but then also by the thought of being able to eat all sorts of sugary treats after hours in the comfort of her own home. “Jessica, you are like the best boss in the world.”

“Well us plump bitches need to stick together. Plus it's part of our company motto “Making people happy”, and it sounds like your friend Ashley needs a little happiness tonight.”

So now that it was the end of her shift, Natalie was was gathering up some goodies to take home. A dozen donuts, a cheesecake, a batch of muffins, choco chunk cookies, and a sheet cake seemed like enough for one evening.

“Ooo, picking out some goodies I see.” Jessica said as she came slinking out from the back, letting the bakery doors slap behind her, narrowly missing her wide plush hips. Jessica made her way up to the counter to see what Natalie had put aside already, spying inside each bag. “Is that it?” Jessica gawked.

“Well yeah. I thought I grabbed as much as we could handle.”

“No, no, no, this just won’t due. What if Ashley isn’t in the mood for strawberry cheesecake? Maybe she wants raspberry, or maybe chocolate peanut butter. You better take one of each just in case. And how can you deny her the delight of our cupcakes? You need at least two dozen for any proper evening. George just got finished with a fresh batch of donuts, you guys are going to melt when you have some, you can’t beat fresh. Here, have another dozen of those. Now let’s see, what else are we missing? Ah, brownies obviously. OMG these are so thick and chewy, make sure you have some milk around to wash it all down. There now it looks like you are all set.” Jess looked over at Natalie, who’s arms looked comically full. Natalie wore a look of astonishment on her face, but she didn’t have the willpower to turn down any of her bosses generosity. She just accepted the gifts, and started to head home.

“Thanks again Jessica, you are really going to brighten up Ashley’s day.” Natalie said as she pushed her way out of the bakery’s entrance.

“Any time.” Jessica wore a smile that reached from ear to ear, and she waved her flabby arm as her plump employee disappeared into the city street.

Breathing out quickly her boobs slapped back into place, and Natalie furiously tried to free her phone from her tight pocket.

“Hello?” Natalie said tepidly into the phone, not having a chance to see who it was from before she picked up, for fear that she spent too much time squeezing the device from her pocket.

“Hey Nat, it’s Ash!” The cheerful voice of her reacquainted friend rang out. “I’m on my way to your place. Not sure if you thought about dinner yet. I know I bought last time, but I know you just started your new job, so I wanted to treat you again. Also I’m like famished. After everything with Trent I’m ready to have like a sizable dinner. So I picked up some Chinese... like a lot of Chinese.” Ashley giggled. “If Trent thinks I’m fat, he will just have to wait and see.” Ashley said playfully.

“Oh I didn’t even think about dinner.” Natalie said dumbly. “But that sounds great. And I grabbed some stuff from the bakery for us. My new boss let me take a bunch of stuff for girls night, totally free.”

When she got home she barreled into her apartment with all the bakery goods, placing everything on the counter. All Natalie cared about tonight was her best friends happiness, but also in the back of her head she was thinking about their conversation earlier. ‘If he thinks I'm fat now, just wait!’ Ashley’s words echoed in her head. ‘I need to be a supportive best friend. I should help Ashley see that she is beautiful because of her curves.’ These thoughts trickled back and forth in Natalia’s head, thoughts about how if they ate together more often she could make sure Ashley was eating well, and how she could make sure her friend was getting the best food around. Natalie was snapped back to reality when Ashley tossed two bags, equal in size to the two previous ones, into Natalie’s arms. The chubby girls brought the bags back inside to begin their girls night.

“Trent is such a dick.” Natalie said bluntly. “It’s been like a year since we’ve done anything like this. He was always such a prick when ever you wanted to have fun like this. Because of him our friendship became more distant.”

“Yeah, screw him, no need to worry about pounds any more.” Natalie scurried across the room to the kitchen counter to help drive her friends point home. The padded girls boobs bounced up and down as she tried to move as fast as her rotund body allowed. Natalie grabbed one of the large cheese cakes and took it back to the couch where Ashley was plopped down on. Popping the top off she handed her best friend a fork. “To freedom.” Natalie cheersed with her fork in the air, before stuffing a big bite in her mouth, causing her to instantly moan with pleasure.

Ashley followed suit and before you knew it both girls were attacking the cake pan like this was the last cheesecake on the planet. Surprised they were able to finish that big of a meal, they just turned their attention to the stack of sweets before them. As they ate more and more their stomachs grew fuller and fuller, and they pushed out further and further. Their shirts started to be unable to contain their growing bellies, inches of juicy flesh started to show itself, but it didn’t slow their appetite one bit.

As they filled up, lethargy set in and their chomping slowed to a crawl. It was more and more of a daunting task to hit the kitchen to grab another treat, and standing in the kitchen had long been abandoned. The bakery goods were running out though, so they just brought the last of it to the coffee table. One of the last things they ate was the large sheet cake. It was so big they decided to split it, but it was too big to hold. Leaving it on the coffee table the girls slid their butts to the floor. Their cushiony butts gave them all the padding they needed to sit comfortably on the ground.

After such a large meal the two of them were wearing more food than they were proud of, but at this point forks were unnecessary. They each took a big chunk of cake in their hand, cramming the sugar laden treat straight into their own mouth. Grunts erupted as the cake was wolfed down, handful at a time. Both girls were in sinful bliss as they stuffed the last bits of sugary delight for the evening into their awaiting maw.

Natalie couldn’t help but reflect. ‘Man if Ashley keeps eating like this, she will balloon in no time. She’ll be bigger than Jessica even. She just looks so happy when she is enjoying all this decadent food, it can't be my place say anything. Plus I don't know why but just like Jessica, Ashley actually looks kind of cute with all her chubby curves.’

Natalie looked across the table at her bloated companion noticing just how fluffy she was looking. Her massive chest rivaled any of the big girls that she knew, and below that her pillow like billowing belly was fuller than full. Her belly even started to spread into her cushiony clap on top of her thick thighs.

“God we really should call it a night.” Natalie filled the silence.

“What do you mean call it? I think our stomachs have done that for us. There’s not a container left in this whole apartment. No that I can eat another thing.” Ashley laughed.

“Next time we will just have to do this at your place.”

“Sounds like a plan.” Ashley braced herself and slowly got up on her feet. After dusting herself off and washing her hands, the two friends hugged and Ashley took her leave. Natalie, too lazy to pick up the giant mess left behind, just retired for the evening leaving the clean up the next day.

Also Ashley had substantially plumped up since Natalie had taken over so she was starting to look much different than before. “Well any friend of Natalie’s is a friend of mine, especially when that friend loves my baked goods. Natalie, from now on give Ashley the friends and family discount, 50% off everything she gets.”

“Wow, really?” Ashley was stunned. She was getting an order daily now, and this would surely save her a lot of dough.

“Of course! What good is making all these amazing creations if I can’t share them with the people we are about. Well Ashley it was a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance, unfortunately I must be off, my Georgie in the back was just preparing everything tomorrow and he’ll need my help. I hope to see you again real soon Ashley.”

“Same to you…” Ashley tried saying before her words could only trail off, as the plump Jessica disappeared behind the swinging kitchen doors.

There was only just a moment of silence before Natalie's jumped in to break it. “Wow I guess she must really like you”

“I guess so, I wasn’t expecting her to give me any sort of discount, that’s so nice of her.”

“Well let’s not let it go to waste.” Natalie was excited, this would surely help her friend plump up even more.

“I guess I’ll take the usual order then.”

“What? Just the usual? You’re getting everything 50% off! You can at least afford a few extras, right? And you’ll still be saving money.”

“Ok fine. Give me one of those cheese cakes, they were so good when you brought them over.”

“Yeah, and remember how good these brownies are? You need some of these too.” Natalie got to ringing up her large order, and it was even cheaper than before with the new discount. Both girls were extremely happy, as Ashley left with her treats and Natalie started to close up shop.

1111111112211111111111.content:
Everything for Natalie and her close circle of friends continued to go well. In the following days Natalie and Ashley continued to frequent Fat Burger for lunch, and Ashley made good use of her friends and family discount at the end of each work day. Natalie on the other hand snacked so much at work it was a marvel that the business was able to stay open with her eating into the profits. But she knew her employers didn’t have any issue with it as Jessica was frequently seen sampling the goods as well.

A couple of weeks later, the weekend was fast approaching and as usual the bakery would be closed. Natalie had recently gotten back from her lunch break, which was now lasting about an hour as she (and subsequently Ashley) started to add on menu items to their order. It started with just some dessert, but then an extra burger or two joined the list, followed by the addition of some more breaded chicken options. Jess had reworked Natalie’s hours to compensate for the extra long lunch so Natalie wasn’t always stressing about getting back on time.

Natalie was tending to the front of the store when Jessica popped out from the back. The day was growing late, and since most of their customers came in the morning or after work let out, there was a usual calm before the storm. Jess opened glass case, fetching out a cream horn before taking a bite and turning her attention to her lone employee.

“So you and your friend Ashley have any more girls nights planned?” Jessica said and she swallowed.

“Actually not really. We’ve been meeting for lunch every day, but I haven’t really been seeing her outside of work. Maybe I’ll see if she is around this weekend.”

“You should see about tomorrow night, that way you can take some goodies from work home with you and they will all be fresh. And don’t worry it’s on me. You were both abuzz about them last time, and I know it really put your friend in a good mood.”

Natalie was taken aback by Jessica’s continued generosity, it seemed she only knew how to be nice and charitable. “Really? Are you sure?”

Jessica’s lips curled into a smile as she wiped the excess sugar from her hands where the cream horn once was. “One condition though.” She paused for emphasis. “I get invited!” Natalie let out a big sigh, as she wasn't sure where Jess was going there. “I could use a good night out. I love George to death, but a night out of the house will do me good. Plus if you guys are half as fun as you sound I know I’ll have a blast.”

“Ok sounds like a plan!” Natalie was actually excited by this turn of events. Jessica was the coolest most fun boss she had ever had, and she knew there was no judgement because she was just as wide as her. Natalie got her phone right out and started texting Ashley before a rush of customers came in.

11111111122111111111111.content:
As the 5 o’clock rush started, Natalie slipped her phone back in her apron, and almost forgot she had even texted Ashley. Thankfully for the two owners business was at an all time high, and the last minute rush was no joke. Natalie spent the next hour helping patrons with their orders, barely even able to manage a break to have a brownie for herself.

It was just about 6 o’clock when the store front closed that a familiar large lumbering form entered the store just as the last customer was leaving. “Ashley, great! You mind locking the door behind you? It’s close enough to six, I don’t need anyone else coming in.” Natalie said as she fell back on her stool, wiping the sweat from her forehead.

Ashley flipped the lock, and made her way over to the counter. “Looks like some one could use a creme puff.” Ashley chuckled, as her thick chins collided with each other as they moved up and down.

“Mmm that's a good idea.” Natalie said as she slid open the glass case, fetching a flakey yet refreshing creme puff.

“God if I could just grab whatever I wanted for free whenever I wanted, I would go hog wild in this place.” Ashley said as she watched her friend gobble down the creamy treat.

“Oh trust me, I have. It’s hard to have restraint in this place.” Natalie said like she had any to begin with. If it wasn’t for customers Natalie would probably be munching 8 hours a day. “I’d sneak ya back here for a few freebies, but I wouldn’t want to get in trouble with the boss. I’ve already been fired from one bakery.”

“Plus Jessica was nice enough to give me a big discount, so I have no problem paying for my snacks. By the way, way to text me and then never respond. Did you want to have a girls night or not?” Ashley chided her good friend.

“Oh I completely forgot, it got so busy here. But yeah I was thinking if you were free tomorrow we could get together.” Natalie was eager for Ashley to say yes, as she wanted to make sure her quest to make her best friend happy by expanding her waistline was still going well.

“Well the only plans I had were with myself and a stack of pizzas, so I guess one more couldn’t hurt.” Ashley, ever the jokester.

“Well actually Jessica wanted to see if she could tag along. She offered to donate snacks from the bakery again, and she was so nice to give us all those treats the first time, I didn’t see the harm in it.”

“Sure, the more the merrier!” Ashley responded. “I’ll order the pizzas, you guys show up with the sweets, and we’ll all have a good time.” Natalie was very pleased. Ashley and her always had fun together, and she felt like Jessica was going to be even more of a hoot outside the walls of the bakery. And what could go wrong with plenty of good food around.

Natalie wrapped up Ashley’s normal purchase, and after she left she went about her normal business of closing up shop. It wasn’t until the following night until things got interesting again.

111111111221111111111111.content:
Work had been usual, a lot of folks picking up orders for parties on the weekend and what not. Jessica had offered to give Natalie a lift to festivities that night, as she had a car and could transport not only the voluptuous pair, but also all the baked goods they would be bringing.

Jessica emerged from the back of the building, already dressed for the evening in a stunning dress that hugged her curves perfectly. “Ready to go?” She tracked down her sole employee. Natalie had also changed from her work uniform to prepare for the evening. She was now dawned in a comfy fall sweater and a pair of leggings. Natalie loved how easy it was to just throw on a pair of dark leggings rather than try and battle with a pair of jeans. “I’ve already got the car packed, all I need is my plump co-pilot.”

“I’m coming, I’m coming.” Natalie huffed as she got the last of her things from the front of the store. They bumbled into the car and off the went across town to Ashley’s place.

“Hey I just want to make a quick stop.” Jessica said as she pulled into a liquor store. “I’ll be right back.” She said as she jumped out of the driver's seat and made her way into the neon lit store. Natalie was confused by the detour, but didn’t want to rock the boat. Suddenly the smell of baked goods wafted into her nose and her stomach let out a large rumble. It’s not like she wasn’t surrounded by the smell all the time, but as Natalie was fully aware, the last hour of work was so hectic she could never stop for a bite to eat. Jessica has rushed her to change as soon as the doors were locked, and then rushed her out of the building before she was able to satisfy her hunger. Besides sleeping, it was rare for Natalie to go for more than an hour these days without some sweet or savory.

Before she knew it, Jessica was on her way back carrying two large cases of beer. She popped them in the trunk and then they were back on the road. “I didn’t know we were going to stop for beer…” Natalie softly brought up the topic.

“You mean you didn’t drink last time at girls night?” Jessica asked.

“No, I mean, I guess not. We just didn’t think about it I guess.”

“Aw man, a nice tasty beer to wash down some pizza and sweets, nothing better. And don’t worry I don’t get the light stuff, that's like drinking piss water.” Jessica seemed cheery, so Natalie played along. Natalie wasn’t the biggest drinker, but it wasn’t like they were throwing a rager, it was just the three of them.

Soon enough they arrived outside of Ashley’s building. They grabbed as much as they could, but would need to make a second trip with Ashley to get the rest. Once inside the warm studio apartment Jessica was the first one to crack open a beer and take a swig.”Ahh that hits the spot!” She sighed after the long work week. “Here don’t be shy.” Jessica said as she popped the tops off two more bottles and passed them out. Natalie and Ashley saw no problem in having a couple of beers, so they both joined Jessica as the beverages quickly slid down their throat. “Alright, get me at that pizza, it smells amazing.” Jessica said, not wasting anytime getting right at home. Ashley led the trio into the kitchen where everyone found something they liked and took it back to the couch. With a beer in one hand and a pizza in the other, each of them was ready to dig right in.

Sabrina was shaking her head in the affirmative as she grabbed yet another pastry.

"It's true!" She said. "When I was home for the holidays, you had a muffin top. By spring break, you had a cute little belly. At the beginning of the summer, you had boobs, and now they're BIG."

Let me tell you, those people can cook, and if you tell them you want more, they love it, and you get more; a LOT MORE. I ate all day, every day. She held a gingerbread cookie in her pudgy fingers, biting into it, her round face almost glowing in revelry, her eyes alight with joy. Her ginger, wavy locks stuck out in all directions as she swallowed, her bountiful breasts bouncing as she leaned forward, pushing herself up slightly against the counter. With a wide smile, cheeks dimpling, she asked, “Hi! Can I get you something?”

“Well, maybe a job application?” Natalie asked, noticing how the name tag clipped on her bust was labeled “Jessica.”

Jessica eyed Natalie up and down. "We don't really have an application, but we are looking for somebody. In fact, you're the only person to even apply in a month. Do you want the job?"

"Just like that?" Natalie asked.

"Can you make change?" Jessica asked.

Jessica smiled. "That won't be a problem here. Our employees are our best advertisers, so we fully expect that you're going to eat what we make. So, are you in?"

Please don't include

1) Explicit sex, though alluding to sex and some mild touching is fine so long as it's in good taste

3) No scat. No vore. None of that stuff. Slobbiness is okay, but nothing intense. It's a wg story.

Additionally, guys can gain too, as can other girls, but the main focus should remain Natalie. Also, gayness is fine too.
